mapper.delete: DELETE FROM course_selection sc WHERE cno = #{cno}
mapper.select: SELECT s.sname, c.cno, c.cname, t.tname, l.dname, c.year, c.dayOfWeek,c.time,c.startWeek,c.endWeek,c.semester FROM students s JOIN course_selection cs ON s.sno = cs.sno JOIN courses c ON cs.cno = c.cno JOIN teaching tch ON c.cno = tch.cno JOIN teachers t ON tch.tno = t.tno JOIN course_locations cl ON c.cno = cl.cno JOIN locations l ON cl.dno = l.dno WHERE s.sno = #{sno} AND c.year = #{year};

SELECT s.sno,s.sname, c.cno, c.semester,cs.grade,c.total_people - c.select_people as remainPeople,c.total_people FROM students s JOIN course_selection cs ON s.sno = cs.sno JOIN courses c ON cs.cno = c.cno
